Height Advantage

  1. What battle cards are in the Metroplex Pack?
    3 x Armored Plating
    3 x Backup Plan
    2 x Combat Training
    2 x Data Pad
    3 x Flamethrower
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Handheld Blaster
    3 x Height Advantage
    3 x Improvised Shield
    3 x Inspiring Leadership
    3 x Protected By Metroplex
    3 x Rally the City
    3 x Rapid Conversion
    3 x Supercharge
  2. I am playing with Metroplex, and I have Backup Beam and Debilitating Crystal attached to him. My opponent has Menasor equipped with Stunticon Swagger. It is my turn, and I play Height Advantage to get the extra bold 4 to try and activate Metroplex's triggered ability from card flipping. As I declare him as the attacker, and Menasor as the defender, Debilitating Crystal activates. I choose to bounce Swagger to my opponent's hand. Does my bold then become active because the effect of Swagger is no longer active? Am I allowed to use the bold from the upgrade and the action now?
    Yes. Both bold effects would apply in this scenario. Stunticon Swagger does not stop a character from getting bold prior to the attack.
